## Plot `interactive plot' with Plotly

```{r, fig.align='center', message = FALSE}
library(plotly)
data(mtcars)
#summary(mtcars)

p <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = mtcars$disp, mtcars$mpg)) + geom_line() + labs(x = "disp", y = "mpg", title = "mtcars data")

ggplotly(p)
```
